thread.title: Alessandra

author: Alessandra
title: Alessandra
text:
I never had pets in my home. Now I have two cats and during summer we need to leave them with someone who love them. This introduced me to TrustedHousesitters world.
I think idea cannot be better than share house with pets, because if you have pets you love ALL pets, so while you're away you're sure your pets are relaxed, happy and above all loved!!
And it's also a nice way to live other lifes in different homes in different countries... I loved to be a pet sitters with Trusted!!
Keep it up
Alessandra
